# elizaos-plugins/plugin-mcp Daily Update (Dec 3, 2025)
## OVERVIEW 
Today's development focused on enhancing the MCP provider with new fields and improving tool response handling, contributing to more robust MCP configuration and agent memory management.

## KEY TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENTS

### Enhanced MCP Provider and Tool Response Handling
A significant feature was added to enhance the MCP provider by introducing an optional `mcpText` field for formatted MCP configuration. This update also improved tool response handling by changing `handleToolResponse` to return a `Memory` object, allowing for better integration with agent memory. The `callTool` function was also enhanced to support these changes. ([#19](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/plugin-mcp/pull/19))
